dev.verification_summary: Confirmed renderTimelineTab and renderCitiesTab functions exist and are properly invoked by switchTab

tasks_completed.description: Verified renderTimelineTab and renderCitiesTab wrapper functions exist
tasks_completed.findings: Both functions found at lines 2028-2034, calling renderTimeline() and renderCities() respectively

tasks_completed.description: Verified switchTab function invokes render functions
tasks_completed.findings: switchTab (line 2008) correctly calls renderTimelineTab() when tabName='timeline' and renderCitiesTab() when tabName='cities'

tasks_completed.description: Verified Timeline and Cities tabs render different content
tasks_completed.findings: renderCities() (line 2522) shows geographic city clusters with attractions grouped by city. renderTimeline() (line 3029) shows Kanban route map with day-by-day timeline by city. Content is distinctly different as required.

implementation_details.logic_flow: switchTab → conditional check → renderTimelineTab/renderCitiesTab → renderTimeline/renderCities → populate tab content

content_differentiation.cities_tab: Geographic clustering - groups attractions by city with accordion layout
content_differentiation.timeline_tab: Kanban route map - shows day-by-day timeline grouped by city with budget totals

root_cause_reference.original_issue: Timeline and Cities tabs showed identical content
root_cause_reference.root_cause_comment: Found in code at lines 2525, 2532, 3032 - previous dev session 123500 claimed to add render functions but didn't implement them
root_cause_reference.fix_implemented: Added renderTimelineTab() and renderCitiesTab() wrapper functions that invoke existing renderTimeline() and renderCities() functions with different rendering logic

dev.qa_confirmation: QA report (docs/dev/qa-report-20260204-151600.json) confirmed Timeline and Cities tabs render different content and all tests passed
dev.qa_notes: Verification complete. Implementation matches QA test results. No further action required.
